offers.desc: Experiment with detox drinks today and notice how light, fresh and clear-headed you feel afterwards.

kids.desc: Berry Goodness is a robust smoothie that bursts with juicy berry flavors and satisfies with theall-mighty chia seed.

dailyApp.title: Why daily J App
dailyApp.desc: Daily needs app will help you explore the world of Daily Needs different  brands, products and long term programs.
dailyApp.be1: Using the app you can easily purchase your most admired product/s after understanding all its components as well as its benefits.
dailyApp.be2: You can have your products delivered to your doorstep at a specific point of time
dailyApp.be3: The app is very user friendly, where you can easily navigate through 24/7

footer.subscribeDesc: Enter your email address for our mailing listto keep yourself updated

about.title: Daily Needs
about.desc: Our farm is a second-generation organic farm that was our parents, Mark & Renée Elliott’s dream to offer thebest and healthiest range of organic foods available, promote health in the community and bring a sense of discovery and adventure into food shopping.Visit our site for a complete list of fresh, organic fruit and vegetables we are offering.

item1.title: Delivery
item1.desc: No more driving and parking for your vegetables! We deliver directly to your doorstep. Save time going to the grocery store.

item2.title: Flexibility
item2.desc: Choose the delivery frequency that best fits your needs: weekly, every other week, every 3rd or every 4th week delivery.

item3.title: Organic Food
item3.desc: We deliver organic produce that is pesticide-free and sustainably-grown, ensuring that we maintain healthy communities.

item4.title: Healthy Diet
item4.desc: Get produce delivered home on a set frequency is essential to obtaining the recommended daily fruits and daily vegetables.

programs.title: Programs
programs.desc: Daily J is a system that serves multiple healthy nutrition products Provide and deliver ready-made healthy nutrition juice, that can work as Detoxes for the body and give it the amount of Vegetables and Fruits needed very easy to use , order and deliver your orders in your suitable time

payment.title: Payment privacy
payment.p1: Payment is to be made in advance by purchasing the product or service that you need through our secure shopping cart.
payment.p2: In some rare cases, we can send a money request via PayPal, but we prefer to have the order go through our shopping cart to generate a work order.
payment.p3: Once payment is received, your purchase will be scheduled to be completed and you will receive an email to that effect.
payment.p4: By placing your order on our website, you agree to our terms and that all sales final.
payment.p5: If you use PayPal Credit (formerly BillMeLater) - Customer Support can be reached at
payment.p6: If you are unable to checkout using PayPal Credit , We would have no idea what the problem might be , so wouldn't be able to help you.
